sentence.Network_en: These figures were often spuriously computed by selecting particularly favorable sample groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些数字往往是用错误的方法计算出来的，所用的都是特别挑选出来的对自己有利的样本组。

sentence.Network_en: The date may be spuriously precise, but the danger is there.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管预测日期之精确貌似伪造, 但是资源枯竭的危险却近在咫尺.

sentence.Network_en: The lawyer argued spuriously that his client knew nothing of the burglary.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个律师虚假地争辩说他的当事人对盗窃一无所知.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... spurious 伪造的 spuriously 伪造地 spurn at 藐视.
骨科常用词汇_骨科文献/教材尽在好课件! ... quartile 四分位,四等分 spuriously 伪造的 tomography 断层摄影.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 购买行为只能称之为虚假的
PerfectNetExp.abs: 必要条件，假如缺少承諾，相互依赖的重覆购买行为只能称之为虚假的(spuriously)

entry.tran: 形似而实非的;虚假的;伪造的
entry.def: Something that is spurious seems to be genuine, but is false.

example.ex: He was arrested in 1979 on spurious corruption charges...
example.tran: 他于1979年因被诬告贪污而被捕。

example.ex: Quite a lot of allegations of misjustice are spurious.
example.tran: 有关不公正的指控有不少是虚假的。

entry.tran: (论点、推理)不正确的，站不住脚的
entry.def: A spurious argument or way of reasoning is incorrect, and so the conclusion is probably incorrect.

example.ex: The justification of this chart is entirely spurious.
example.tran: 这张图表的依据完全站不住脚。

means.word_mean: 1. in a false and spurious manner;

sentences.sentence: "the lawyer argued spuriously that his client knew nothing of the burglary"

auth_sentence.content: That spuriously makes his study look ridiculous.
auth_sentence.res_content: That spuriously makes his study look ridiculous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That spuriously makes his study look ridiculous.
